fxInfo_label: Legislative constraints on the executive index
fxInfo_aggregation: The index is formed by taking the point estimates from a Bayesian factor analysis model of the indicators for legislature questions officials in practice (v2lgqstexp), executive oversight (v2lgotovst), legislature investigates in practice (v2lginvstp), and legislature opposition parties (v2lgoppart).
fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_question: To what extent are the legislature and government agencies e.g., comptroller general, general prosecutor, or ombudsman capable of questioning, investigating, and exercising oversight over the executive?
name: v2xlg_legcon
